title: Historic City of Springfield Welcomes Latest Hampton Inn & Suites by HiltonTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Historic City of Springfield Welcomes Latest Hampton Inn & Suites by Hilton Published on : Thursday, October 8, 2015
Hilton Worldwide announced the opening of Hampton Inn & Suites by Hilton Springfield/Downtown, its newest property to join Hampton by Hilton, the global brand of more than 2,000 mid-priced Hampton Inn by Hilton, Hampton Inn & Suites by Hilton and Hampton by Hilton hotels. The 87-room hotel, located at 881 East Columbus Ave, is managed by E. Columbus Ave LLC.
Located just off of I-91, Hampton Inn & Suites by Hilton Springfield/Downtown is nearby popular area attractions including Six Flags New England, the Basketball Hall of Fame, the Forest Park Zoo and the MassMutual Center.
“We are excited to welcome guests to the rich culture, hometown restaurants, and deep-rooted history of downtown Springfield,” said Dante Brown, general manager. “Springfield is a beautiful town on the bank of the Connecticut River, and is a perfect example of the Pioneer Valley’s unique history. This city has been a cultural center since its founding in 1852, and has become an important site for American culture as it is the birthplace of both Dr. Seuss and the game of basketball.”
Hampton Inn & Suites by Hilton Springfield/Downtown offers amenities such as free Wi-Fi, a 24-hour business center with complimentary printing, a 550 square-foot meeting space that can accommodate up to 25 people and a fitness center. Unwind in the heated indoor pool, or work conveniently with unlimited free Wi-Fi. The hotel also provides free On the House hot breakfast as well as Hampton’s On the RunTM Breakfast Bags, available Monday through Friday.
The new hotel features the Perfect Mix Lobby, designed as an extension of the guestroom with a variety of seating and lighting options for both leisure and business travelers. Additionally, the hotel features TREATS, a new food and beverage shop filled with snacks, toiletries, local merchandise and drinks for purchase. Guestrooms are equipped with the brand’s signature Clean and fresh Hampton bed®, flat-screen TV, large desk, radio alarm clock and coffeemaker. Inviting suites are also available, offering additional space and a comfortable sleeper sofa.
Hampton by Hilton team members proudly exhibit a unique culture described as Hamptonality. This term describes each hotel’s approach to friendly customer service and anticipation of guests’ needs and providing travelers with helpful suggestions about area attractions, historical facts and fun things to do around town. Additionally, hotels are infused with local photography and artwork, highlighting each property’s connection and support to its own community.
Source:-Hampton Inn
